description: Looks nice ..but why does trying to drag the map into place with your mouse, drag the whole app window out of place?
I love it; also great on Android.
add more like bus rutes and info etc....
not usable with mouse and keyboard. no labels on buttons, click and drag drags the whole window, etc. works great on mobile.

i am severely disabled so im looking forward to finding blue bage spaces with OM as it can be very difficult finding them. i have classic autism and mild learning disability so for me the app hhas got to be simple enough and clear for me to process. this will come in handy so thankyou very much for developing this. works fab on my steam deck.   in terms of disabled/blue badge parking,do you need any community help with finding these spaces as i imagine itd take alot of work? also is it possible to make the layout a little clearer for disabled or ESOL users? maybe offering tips or pictorials on each field/icon when someone hovers it. i pay for a makaton subscription so if you want any pictorials id love to help.
Already fantastic, clear, fast and beautiful. Can't wait for the gpx features...!
summary: A real clear and beautiful app...!

description:
Needs:
-Better pop-ups for POI
-A way to zoom+rotate map with touchpad/drag
-Dark mode switch, outdoor mode
What I like:
-Map rendering
-Downloading map data
-Route calculation
Despite screenshots here, there is no dark mode, pretty useless for most professionals.

Dev told me how on android feedback how to TURN ON DARK Mode:

1) with Mouse Right_Click on top_bar menu HELP. 
2) Choose SEARCH 
3) in search panel that appears, at bottom terxt-field can search for locations. 
For DARK MODE type: 
?dark
(for dark mode) and ?light will switch back to light mode! 
Do not ask me why they hide this setting & nothing in help file at this time. They put preferences in help menu too tho not much! Android version is much more advanced but this is good too.
Press helpful vote below so future users (moatly coders only working with dark mode) can learn how to do dark mode.
Konnte sogar bis an die Gebäude ranzoomen.
summary: Bei meinem 22.04 LTS habe ich keine Probleme

description: Alle Karten heruntergeladen - dann Offline Suchfunktion verwendet - nach Eingabe der ersten Zahl oder Buchstabens stürzt das Programm ab

Ich nutze Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.
Habe das gleiche Problem wie user0, wenn ein Ort gesucht wurde und danach eine Routenplanung versucht wird, stürzt das Programm sofort ab.
Lässt man es im Hintergrund laufen, verabschiedet es sich auch nach einer gewissen Zeit.

Скачивается всё что попало, не может определить место положение (при первом запуске), вылетает при поиске скачки города.

А так хоть работает +-
